title: Fauci says we risk creating more powerful COVID-19 variants if we delay 2nd shots of the vaccine
content:
1. Fauci says we risk creating more powerful COVID-19 variants if we delay 2nd shots of the vaccine  Yahoo News
  2. New guidance might come soon for people who have been fully vaccinated for Covid-19, Fauci says  CNN
  3. South Africa pauses AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine program after found to be less effective against va  WWLP-22News
  4. Op-ed: Why states should give the new Johnson & Johnson COVID-19 vaccine to young adults first  Chicago Tribune
  5. Op-Ed: Show Me (and Patients) Your Vaccine Selfie  MedPage Today
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: Fauci说，如果我们推迟疫苗的第2次注射，我们就有可能创造出更强大的COVID-19变种。
